tool.name: Get biomaterials
tool.command:
tripaille expression get_biomaterials
#if $provider_id: --provider_id '$provider_id' #end if #if $biomaterial_id: --biomaterial_id '$biomaterial_id' #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id '$organism_id' #end if #if $dbxref_id: --dbxref_id '$dbxref_id' #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: provider_id
param.label: Provider Id
param.help: Limit query to the selected provider

param.name: biomaterial_id
param.label: Biomaterial Id
param.help: Limit query to the selected biomaterial

param.name: dbxref_id
param.label: Dbxref Id
param.help: Limit query to the selected ref
